body_html:
@mruberry Hi, this problem only happen when the dataset is large. I have tried MNIST dataset and a small version of vggface2 dataset with only 34 classes, and it's working ok. However, when I used a full version of vggface2 dataset, this error happend.
By the way, I think using imagenet dataset with resnet model may reproduce this problem.
body_text:
@mruberry Hi, this problem only happen when the dataset is large. I have tried MNIST dataset and a small version of vggface2 dataset with only 34 classes, and it's working ok. However, when I used a full version of vggface2 dataset, this error happend.
By the way, I think using imagenet dataset with resnet model may reproduce this problem.
body:
@mruberry Hi, this problem only happen when the dataset is large. I have tried MNIST dataset and a small version of vggface2 dataset with only 34 classes, and it's working ok. However, when I used a full version of vggface2 dataset, this error happend. 
By the way, I think using imagenet dataset with resnet model may reproduce this problem.
